pr_title: Add documentation creating WebClient using HealthCheckedEndpointGroup

timeline.message:
Add documentation creating WebClient using HealthCheckedEndpointGroup
I recently heard that some of our users specified the original endpoint group not the `HealthCheckecEndpointGroup` when build a `WebClient`.
So I thought we need to reinforce the documentation.

timeline.bodyText:
, otherwise health checking will not be enabled.
We can't predict the future of whether there are unhealthy endpoints or not so should just state the facts.
